response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its unique features and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $1,200,000. I am confident this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with a substantial advantage compared to its market value. I look forward to discussing this further with you and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1200000}
